name: dark_library.jpg
description: Full image of a moody, dimly lit library or study, with warm but sparse lighting creating areas of deep shadow, and bookshelves in the background that are out of focus to create a shallow depth of field.

name: ornate_key.png
description: A single, old, ornate key made of detailed brass or bronze, positioned vertically and emitting a subtle, magical glow, in a white background.

name: forge_background.jpg
description: Full image of a dark, fiery industrial forge environment, filled with the intense orange light of molten metal, flying sparks, and a visible heat haze distorting background elements.

name: glowing_sword.png
description: A powerful, epic-looking sword presented vertically, point-down, with a detailed hilt and a sharp metallic blade that glows with a bright, inner white light, in a white background.

name: digital_background.jpg
description: Full image of a dark black background featuring streams of cascading green digital characters and numbers, with varying brightness to create depth, reminiscent of the digital rain effect.

name: dotcom_graveyard.jpg
description: Full image of a desolate graveyard landscape at dusk under a dim twilight sky, filled with weathered tombstones and a thick layer of mist covering the ground.

name: fog_overlay.png
description: A semi-transparent layer of thick, white fog, denser at the bottom and fading out towards the top, designed as an atmospheric overlay, in a white background.

name: stormy_sky.jpg
description: Full image of a dark, dramatic sky filled with turbulent, heavy grey storm clouds, with a hint of a lightning bolt flashing within the clouds, illuminating them from the inside.

name: damaged_tower.png
description: A tall, ancient stone tower standing strong but showing visible damage, such as large cracks and missing stones, conveying resilience, in a white background.

name: cracking_ground.jpg
description: Full image of a high-resolution, close-up, top-down shot of dry, parched earth or concrete covered in a network of deep, spreading cracks.

name: blueprint.jpg
description: Full image of a detailed and complex technical blueprint on a dark blue background, featuring crisp white lines, measurements, and annotations depicting intricate plans.

name: glowing_lines.png
description: An overlay of a complex, circuit-like pattern of electric-blue lines with a soft, neon-like glow, designed to be superimposed on a technical drawing, in a white background.

name: dark_machinery.jpg
description: Full image of a background filled with complex, interlocking gears and cogs made of dark, slightly greasy metal, with low-key lighting highlighting the gear teeth.

name: golden_coin.png
description: A single, shiny, realistically rendered golden coin standing on its edge at a slight angle, with a highly polished, reflective surface and a glint of light, in a white background.

name: stock_chart.jpg
description: Full image of a digital stock market chart on a dark screen, predominantly showing a jagged red line and bearish candlestick patterns to indicate a sharp downward trend.

name: green_uptick.png
description: A single, sharp, vibrant green line with a neon-like glow, moving diagonally upwards and ending in an arrowhead to signify a strong positive trend, in a white background.

name: package_mountain.jpg
description: Full image of an immense, overwhelming mountain made entirely of brown cardboard shipping boxes, stretching far into the distance to create a sense of vast scale.

name: glowing_speck.png
description: A single, tiny but intensely bright pinpoint of white light with a soft surrounding glow, similar to a distant star, in a white background.

name: upward_graph.jpg
description: Full image of a clean, modern digital graph on a sleek interface, featuring a steady and strong solid green line moving consistently upwards to represent positive growth.

name: factory_floor.jpg
description: Full image of a bustling, modern, and brightly lit factory interior, showing efficient activity with automated conveyor belts, robotic arms, and neatly organized shelves.

name: wall_street_building.png
description: The facade of an iconic Wall Street building with classical columns, rendered to appear semi-transparent and faded like a ghostly overlay, in a white background.

name: engine_room.jpg
description: Full image of the dark, atmospheric interior of a massive industrial engine room, filled with large pipes, valves, and machinery under dramatic lighting with strong highlights and deep shadows.

name: glowing_core.png
description: A spherical, bright energy core pulsating with intense blue or orange light, emitting rays and appearing powerful and energetic, in a white background.

name: endless_road.jpg
description: Full image of a straight, paved road from a low angle, stretching endlessly towards a distant horizon across a flat, open landscape under a vast sky.

name: dissolving_finish_line.png
description: A checkered finish line tape stretched across the frame, which is actively breaking apart and dissolving into small particles on one side, in a white background.

name: abstract_tech_background.jpg
description: Full image of a dark, abstract background featuring flowing, curved lines of light like fiber optics and scattered, glowing data points, creating a sense of digital movement.

name: rocket_launch.png
description: A large rocket viewed from the side as it takes off, blasting a massive plume of fire and smoke from its engines as it ascends, in a white background.

name: dna_strand.png
description: A glowing, stylized DNA double helix with a luminous, futuristic blue or green light, viewed at an angle to represent science and experimentation, in a white background.

name: crane_building.png
description: A sharp, black silhouette of a large construction crane working on the steel framework of a skyscraper under construction, in a white background.

name: concrete_foundation.jpg
description: Full image of a massive, epic-scale construction foundation, showing a deep concrete base with a dense grid of steel rebar sticking out, conveying strength and scale.

name: looming_shadows.png
description: Dark, shadowy silhouettes of a cluster of imposing corporate skyscrapers, appearing as if seen through a distant mist to create a looming, intimidating effect, in a white background.
